commenter_a: Norway has a single payer health system as does every other civilized country in the world but us. Get insurance companies out of the middle of my health care. post_message: U.S. drug prices are higher for 93% of 40 top branded drugs compared to Norway. That is unacceptable. We should use our buying power to get better deals for the American people.
